result.execSummary:
The defendant Jamie Lee Wadkins was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution to victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Concurrent with: Minnesota Probation

miscConds.notes: No violent or abusive contact with JKS.

Provide DNA sample within 30 days.
Absolute sobriety.
Comply with any programming as recommended by the COMPAS assessment and/or Department of Corrections.
6 days credit if probation is revoked.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jamie Lee Wadkins

records.addlTxt: Pierce County DNA Proof of Submission

01:22 PM Defendant Jamie Lee Wadkins in court with attorney Liesl E. Nelson.  Kaley Walker appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 22CM6 and 22CM98 heard at this time. ADA Walker: guilty to 22CM6 with 1 year probation concurrent with MN probation: no violent or abusive contact with victim, AODA.  Dismiss 22CM98. Atty Nelson and Defendant agree.   Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights form is filed with the court; court reviews with Def.  Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and constitutional rights.  Defendant understands charges, penalties and constitutional rights. Def pleas guilty to 22CM6. Counsel stipulates to factual basis.   Court finds def is making plea knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily and waives constitutional rights. Court finds a factual basis to accept the plea. Court finds Defendant guilty of 22CM6. Dismisses 22CM98. ADA Walker and Atty Nelson address sentencing.  Court orders S/W 1 year probation; concurrent to MN probation; court costs ($443), DNA sample within 30 days, absolute sobriety,  AODA and F/T, no violent or abusive contact with JKS,  Comply with any programming as recommended by the COMPAS assessment and/or Department of Corrections. 6 days credit if probation is reovked.  Appeal rights are given to the defendant.

ADDRESS INFO for Jamie Lee Wadkins

Prior: 1450 South Wasson Lane #70, River Falls, WI 54022
Plea hearing on May 17, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Court questions non-appearance, Def responds. Court will quash the warrant and reinstate the bond. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:36 pm.  Plea hearing scheduled for May 17, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Plea hearing on March 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

If Defendant is in custody, she will need to be transported. 226  Plea hearing scheduled for March 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Atty Nelson agrees. Court authorizes warrant and stays until March 21 hearing. 2:35  Status conference scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

03:41 PM Defendant Jamie Lee Wadkins appears via videoconferencing from PCJ with Attorney Liesl E. Nelson via phone.  Defendant Jamie Lee Wadkins in custody.  DA Halle E. Hatch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court confirms receipt of Complaint.  
court advises of charge and possible penalties.  Defendant requests Complaint read, Court reads.  Constitutional rights explained to Defendant.  Atty. Nelson enters NG plea.  State requests $1,000 signature bond w/condition of NVOAC w/JKS and AS.  No objection.  Court orders bond as requested, advises of additional conditions.  Defendant qualifies for PD.  Court questions Defendant's address, phone, dob.  Non-military.  Adjourned at 3:48 PM  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 10, 2022 at 10:00 am.
